name: Forbidden Magna
description:
Forbidden Magna is a RPG game developed by Neverland. It came out on 02-10-2014. It was published by Marvelous AQL.
You can play Forbidden Magna on Nintendo 3DS.
Yoshifumi Hashimoto produced the game. It was directed by Masahide Miyata. It was scored by Tomoko Morita.
